comment.body:
What is "Sign and Publish" in blog?
And why the flat design?
for me is I do not like.

> [nobite](#comment_2_13KnmV3n2ZEpU77hx4WuLVdBrUR3kidtq7): you mean it won't scale?

No, I do not like it

> [nobite](#comment_6_13KnmV3n2ZEpU77hx4WuLVdBrUR3kidtq7): why? what reason? and what would you suggest ?

nothing, sorry for this comment

> [manoblanca](#comment_1_1AVyuxwjwWQ1sLymctrceW1L5GyS574Ru5): En Français je pourrait faire un zeroBlog .trop difficile en Anglais . Mes amitiés

à coté de "zeroblog", vous cliquez sur les trois petit points aligné vertical, et cliquez sur "clone".

> [holasick](#comment_2_19vd2X9VjRkgY3qbtuTs6bvMcJCRZJY9Z6): bug : if you delete an item, it delete the previous item

this problem is done

> [sirenyc](#comment_15_19sggoAZ4hcorrrfWoFWP9rwfpVsL29cnZ): The Future is here!!  =d

Absolutly but me :: never! :(

i'm abandon zerome :(((((
